exercises.description: Sử dụng Pandas để xử lý missing values trong DataFrame
exercises.initialCode:
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

# Tạo DataFrame mẫu với missing values
data = {
    'Name': ['An', 'Binh', np.nan, 'Dung'],
    'Age': [25, np.nan, 30, 22],
    'Salary': [1000, 1500, np.nan, 1200]
}
df = pd.DataFrame(data)

# TODO: Xử lý missing values
# 1. Điền giá trị trung bình cho cột Age

# 3. Xóa rows có Salary = NaN

exercises.solution:
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

data = {
    'Name': ['An', 'Binh', np.nan, 'Dung'],
    'Age': [25, np.nan, 30, 22],
    'Salary': [1000, 1500, np.nan, 1200]
}
df = pd.DataFrame(data)

# Xử lý missing values
df['Age'].fillna(df['Age'].mean(), inplace=True)
df['Name'].fillna('Unknown', inplace=True)
df = df.dropna(subset=['Salary'])

print(df)
hints: Dùng fillna() để điền giá trị

exercises.solution:
class Node:
    def __init__(self, data):
        self.data = data
        self.next = None

def reverse_linked_list(head):
    prev = None
    current = head
    
    while current:
        next_node = current.next  # Lưu next node
        current.next = prev        # Đảo chiều pointer
        prev = current             # Di chuyển prev
        current = next_node        # Di chuyển current
    
    return prev  # prev là head mới

node1 = Node(1)
node2 = Node(2)
node3 = Node(3)
node1.next = node2
node2.next = node3

new_head = reverse_linked_list(node1)
print(new_head.data)  # Output: 3

Docker Bài 1: Write Dockerfile
exercises.initialCode:
# TODO: Viết Dockerfile cho Node.js app
# Base image: node:18-alpine
# Working directory: /app
# Copy package files và install dependencies
# Copy source code
# Expose port 3000
# Command: npm start
exercises.solution:
# Base image
FROM node:18-alpine

# Set working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Copy package files
COPY package*.json ./

# Install dependencies
RUN npm install

# Copy source code
COPY . .

# Expose port
EXPOSE 3000

# Start command
CMD ["npm", "start"]
